tab1.title1: Welcome to The Wilderness Role Play Cluster!
tab1.text1:
Rules are posted in Discord and must be followed.

This server is Role Play, joining Discord is required (link below).

<TextStyle.Green>We are glad you are here!</>

tab2.text1:
8X Taming
3X Harvesting
3X  XP
0.5X Mating Interval
8X Maturation
5X Hatching
5X Imprinting
1X Hexagon Reward
Custom Loot Drops

Examples:
Argentavis: 35m incubation, 6h48m maturity, mating cooldown 9h to 24h, 2 imprints required for 100%
Rex: 1h incubation, 11h34m maturity, mating cooldown 9h to 24h, 3 imprints required for 100%
